data.name: AccountName_Incorrect
data.value: Your Guild Wars 2 account name is inccorect. Please make sure to also specify the last 4 Digits of your GW2 account name.

data.name: Cancel_MessageNotFound
data.value: Successfully canceled the reaction event, but could not find the message to delete.

data.name: Cancel_MissingPermissions
data.value: Successfully canceled the reaction event, but could not delete the message because of missing permissions.

data.name: Cancel_Success
data.value: Successfully canceled and deleted the message.

data.name: Emoji_Custom
data.value: Custom emotes are currently not supported!

data.name: Emoji_NoSpecified
data.value: No Emoji was specified!

data.name: Emoji_Success
data.value: Successfully set {0} as new {1} Emoji! Please also make sure to use the commands !cancel and !inactivity so that everything works as intended again!

data.name: Error
data.value: I'm sorry but there was an error. Please contact the Author {0} and tell them about the following error: {1}.

data.name: GetRaid_NoRaids
data.value: No Raids were found.

data.name: GetRaid_Success
data.value: The current raids are:

data.name: GuildMemberUpdated_Start
data.value: Starting to listen to the "GuildMemberUpdated" event.

data.name: GuildMemberUpdated_Stop
data.value: Stopped listening to the "GuildMemberUpdated" event.

data.name: Inactive_Success
data.value: Thank you for answering the questions. Your Inactivity Report will now be proccessed by your Raid-Leaders or one of the moderators. Please be patient, as this proccess will take some time.

data.name: InactivityRole_Added
data.value: Inactivity Role already added.

data.name: Inactivity_AccountName
data.value: Your Guild Wars 2 account name

data.name: Inactivity_AccountName_DigitsMissing
data.value: Please also specifiy the last 4 digits of your GW2 account name!

data.name: Inactivity_Active
data.value: You are no longer inactive!

data.name: Inactivity_Active_Lead
data.value: {0} is no longer inactive!

data.name: Inactivity_Channel
data.value: The current destination channel is: {0}

data.name: Inactivity_Duration
data.value: How long will you be inactive/paused?

data.name: Inactivity_Embed_AccountName
data.value: Account name

data.name: Inactivity_Embed_Period
data.value: Period

data.name: Inactivity_Embed_Raids
data.value: Raids

data.name: Inactivity_Embed_Reason
data.value: Reason

data.name: Inactivity_Embed_Title
data.value: Inactivity!

data.name: Inactivity_Forced
data.value: The raider {0} was set inactive by {1}

data.name: Inactivity_Message
data.value: React with {0} to be inactiv or {1} to be active again!

data.name: Inactivity_MissingChannel
data.value: No destination channel is specified. Please make sure to specifiy one, using the command !setChannel

data.name: Inactivity_MissingRole
data.value: No inactivity role is specified. Please make sure to specifiy one, using the command !setRole

data.name: Inactivity_NoChannel
data.value: No destination channel was set. To set one, use the command !channel [channelName] (where [channelName] is the name of the channel or the ping to it)

data.name: Inactivity_NoRole
data.value: No inactivity role was set. To set one, use the command !role [roleName] (where [roleName] is the name of the role or the ping of it)

data.name: Inactivity_Reason
data.value: Please state the reason, as to why you are pausing

data.name: Inactivity_Role
data.value: The current inactivity role is: {0}

data.name: Missing_Reason
data.value: The inactivity message was not sent because the reason is missing.

data.name: RemoveRaid_RaidNotFound
data.value: The Raid is not present in the collection. To see what Raid is in the collection currently, use the command "!getRaids".

data.name: RemoveRaid_Success
data.value: The Raid was successfully removed from the collection!

data.name: SetChannel_NoChannel
data.value: Please provide a channel by referencing it with # and the channel name. e.g. #inactivity

data.name: SetChannel_Success
data.value: Succesfully set the destination channel!

data.name: SetLanguage_NoLocale
data.value: No Language code was provided. Please specify either "en-US" for English or "de-DE" for German!

data.name: SetLanguage_NotSupported
data.value: The provided Language code was wrong or is currently not supported. Either use "en-US" for English or "de-DE" for German.

data.name: SetLanguage_Success
data.value: Successfully changed language!

data.name: SetRaid_AlreadyExisting
data.value: The Raid-Role is already present in the collection.

data.name: SetRaid_NoRaid
data.value: Please specify a raid role either by pinging it (with an @) or writing the name of it.

data.name: SetRaid_NotFound
data.value: Could not find the specified raid role. Please make sure that the name is correct and it exists.

data.name: SetRaid_Success
data.value: Successfully added the Raid Role!

data.name: SetRole_NoRole
data.value: Please specify a role by referencing it with an @. e.g. @inactive, @admin, ...

data.name: SetRole_RoleNotFound
data.value: Could not find the specified role. Please make sure that the name is correct and it exists.

data.name: SetRole_Success
data.value: Successfully set the inactive role!

data.name: Timeout
data.value: The Bot no longer reacts to incoming messages, as the reply took too long.
